pages.title: Spiny King Crab
pages.text: Paralithodes rathbuni, the spiny king crab, is a species of king crab in the family Lithodidae.$(br2)It is found in the East Pacific Ocean off California.

pages.title: Spiny King Crab
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cod$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
